description: Students will learn the scientific principles behind how and why HIIT works, how to set up a HIIT
workout, and the evidence-based rationale regarding the recommended ratios of rest and recovery.
This HIIT course is designed for students with a higher level of physical fitness, as this type of
training involves repeated bouts of high-intensity effort followed by varied recovery times.
Prerequisite: Students must be able to run a mile in under 8 minutes.
